text: Highway 17A (British Columbia Highway 17A) is a short route connecting Highway 99 and Highway 17. This route was formerly numbered Highway 17 between these two points but the numbering was changed once the South Fraser Perimeter Road neared completion (on December 1, 2012). ==Related pages== *British Columbia Highway 17 Category:British Columbia provincial highways Category:Highways in Greater Vancouver Category:Trans-Canada Highway
title: British Columbia Highway 17A
